name: ON&SYS
customer_avatar:
{"description":"ON&SYS is a Qatar-based brand offering advanced air conditioning and cooling solutions designed to deliver comfort, efficiency, and reliability. The brand focuses on modern cooling technology that suits both residential and commercial spaces.

ON&SYS products are built to perform in extreme climates, offering powerful cooling, energy efficiency, and long-lasting durability to support comfortable living and working environments.

Target Audience

Homeowners

Families

Working professionals

Offices & commercial spaces

Market Focus

ON&SYS primarily serves the Qatar market, providing high-quality air conditioning solutions through online and local channels, with a strong focus on performance, trusted service, and customer satisfaction.","pain_points":"Fast & free shipping
Get your orders delivered swiftly with free shipping, ensuring no additional charges and prompt arrival.

Quick Installation
Experience a quick setup and immediately enjoy the revitalizing benefits, all designed to provide you with the utmost convenience.

After-Sales Service
We deliver lasting comfort with the best air conditioners in Qatar and after-sales service that never lets you down."}

name: Durofill
customer_avatar:
{"description":"Durofill is an India-based brand specialising in epoxy tile joint fillers. Durofill replaces traditional cement grout with strong, glossy, and long-lasting epoxy joints that improve the look and durability of tiled spaces.

Durofill products are waterproof, stain-resistant, and easy to maintain, making them ideal for homes, commercial spaces, and high-traffic areas.

Target Audience:

Tile installers and contractors

Builders and developers

Interior designers

Tile and building material dealers

Market Focus:

Durofill mainly serves the Indian construction and interiors market, supporting residential and commercial projects with reliable epoxy joint solutions and a growing dealer network.","pain_points":""Cement grout cracks and fades over time

Tile joints absorb water and stains

Dirt and fungus build up in tile gaps

Frequent cleaning and maintenance needed

Poor finishing that spoils the look of tiles

Tile joints wearing out in high-use areas

Rework required due to weak grou""}

customer_avatar:

Target Audience:

Homeowners and tenants relocating within the UAE

Businesses and offices requiring relocation services

Clients needing secure packing, transport, or storage solutions

Market Focus:
Residential and commercial moving services across the UAE, with an emphasis on safe handling, timely delivery, and stress-free relocation experiences.","pain_points":"* Stressful relocation process
* Risk of damage to belongings
* Unreliable or unprofessional movers
* Delays and poor time management
* Hidden costs or unclear pricing
* Difficulty handling heavy or fragile items"}

name: Clean Kerala
customer_avatar:
{"description":"Clean Keralam Trust is a Kerala-based organization providing waste collection and disposal services. They focus mainly on food and organic waste management, helping homes, hotels, restaurants, and businesses keep their surroundings clean and hygienic.

By following safe and eco-friendly disposal methods, Clean Keralam Trust helps reduce pollution and supports a cleaner environment across Kerala.

Target Audience

Hotels and restaurants

Homes and apartments

Offices and institutions

Commercial establishments

Market Focus

Clean Keralam Trust operates across Kerala, offering reliable waste management solutions that support cleanliness and sustainability.","pain_points":"Irregular or missed waste collection

Bad smell from food and organic waste

Lack of proper food waste disposal solutions

Health and hygiene issues caused by waste buildup

Complaints from neighbors or authorities

Difficulty managing daily waste from hotels and restaurants

No reliable service for bulk waste collection

Environmental pollution due to improper dumping

Time and effort wasted in handling waste daily"}

name: Ace Impacts
competitor_info: [{"name":"Corrotech Construction Chemicals, Abu Dhabi","website":"https://www.mctuae.com/corrotech-construction-chemicals/"},{"name":"Mapei Construction Chemicals LLC","website":"https://www.mapei.com/ae/en/about-us/mapei-in-uae"},{"name":"ACCORD CHEMICAL INDUSTRY LLC","website":"https://accordchemicals.ae/"}]
customer_avatar:
{"description":"ACE Impacts is a UAE-based construction chemicals manufacturer specializing in tile adhesives, waterproofing systems, grouts, and bitumen products. The brand delivers high-performance, durable solutions designed to meet the demands of modern construction environments and extreme climate conditions.

Target Audience:

Construction contractors and builders

Real estate developers

Infrastructure and industrial project teams

Building material distributors

Market Focus:
Primarily serving the UAE construction sector, ACE Impacts supports residential, commercial, and industrial projects with reliable, performance-driven chemical solutions, while steadily expanding its presence in regional and global markets.","pain_points":"* Inconsistent product quality leading to tile failures, leaks, and rework

* Poor performance of construction chemicals under extreme heat and humidity

* Delays caused by unreliable or slow-setting materials on project sites

* High maintenance and repair costs due to low-grade adhesives or waterproofing systems

* Limited access to technically reliable, tested construction solutions

* Lack of dependable supplier support and product guidance

* Difficulty sourcing products that meet both performance and cost-efficiency requirements

These challenges drive the demand for reliable, high-performance construction chemicals that deliver long-term durability and consistent results across diverse project conditions."}
